function handleDeleteAccount(name){if(!window.confirm(`Delete account "${name}"? function handleDeleteEmpire(name){if(!window.confirm(`Delete empire "${name}"? function handleAddTreaty(){setTreatyDialog({open:true,mode:'new',data:null});setTreatyError('');}// Treaties: open edit
